review: Loved it. Its easy to use.
author: Lauren

review: The movies under the prime are old and outdated and of no intrest to what I like watching. I see why they are free to watch. Waste of money in my opinion.
author: J.R.

review: I found it pretty simple to set up, simple to use, and my video quality is the same as with my cable service. Occasionally, my NBC app will hesitate for a few seconds, but movies and TV shows are good to go. It makes unbundling from my expensive, ridiculous, 2,000 channel Verizon subscription a real option.
author: Robert A. Carey

review: Haven't had it installed too long, but so far it has been great.  Both my husband and granddaughter are enjoying it very much.  And I anticipate many happy hours watching it too.
author: Cheryl R. Lawson

review: Ditched my Apple TV after getting this. It is awesome. Offers soMuch more, works with my streaming qnap server so I don't have to run media through iTunes anymore too (using plex now) I love it!
author: Thomas Seal

review: We are enjoying the movies and TV stations
author: Marion O.

review: I bought this for the bedroom TV so it does not get used that often.  It works fine.  I do not have any problems with programs not starting or freezing as I had seen in some other reviews.  I do prefer the Roku user interface better than the Fire stick.  But that's a matter of personal preference.
author: BillDare

review: Love it, apps run smooth, easy setup.... good price.
author: Austin Safko
